text: in today's episode of shield hero cut
content we're going to go through
episodes 9 and 10 where a lot of the cut
content centers around details regarding
the story's secondary characters sure
there's still quite a few scenes i'll
talk about that cover now fumi filo and
raptalia's developing relationship but
we also get a closer look into mel
remark's royal family and the mentality
of the other three heroes so join me
once again as i go through all the major
things that the anime skipped from both
the light novel and the manga
episode 9 melty covering volume 4
chapters 13-15 from the manga and volume
3 chapters 1 to 4 from the light novel
we start the episode with the party
facing off against a horde of monsters
for a job that now fumi said he forced
them to take this job was a direct
result of slaying the zombie dragon from
last episode with the dragon dead new
monsters had started making their way
through the mountains and because the
village was near these mountains these
new monsters would occasionally approach
and attack the village so the villagers
requested that now fumi defend the
village at least until these monsters
learned that it was a dangerous place to
be approached of course naufumi was a
bit reluctant but after all the
treatment that they gave to raptalia he
felt that he couldn't decline their
request
it's during this job that we get a
closer look at naofumi's current mental
state raftalia had mentioned that she
felt slower likely due to the curse now
fumi was very apologetic about the whole
thing constantly apologizing whenever he
got the chance but what he really
thought was that it was all the other
three heroes as faults if they had just
taken care of their problems thoroughly
he wouldn't have to keep cleaning up
after them and raftalia wouldn't be
cursed raftalia being the saint she is
notices naofumi's regret and makes him
promise not to apologize anymore because
both her and filo knew what they were
getting into she just wanted him to not
have to worry about it so much but it
was very clearly having a pretty big
toll on his conscience anyway they
finish up the job and start heading back
to the village which as you know in the
anime is how they stumble across melty
given melty's appearance and now fumi's
initial thoughts were that this girl
would attempt to buy philo from him his
reason being that many merchants in the
past would offer him a lot of money in
exchange for filo but rather than simply
brushing them off he would use that
opportunity to redirect the conversation
to his handmade accessories and attempt
to sell those instead it was a pretty
good method of gaining some extra cash
however to now fumi's surprise mal just
looked like she wanted to be friends
with filo as if she had a genuine
interest in her he took this opportunity
to let filo be around other kids but
that wasn't the only reason he lets her
play in the manga he assumes she's the
daughter of a rich traveling merchant
and he uses her interest in filo to try
to get on her good side and see if she
could get her family to owe him a favor
it's an instance that highlights how
naofumi is always looking for ways to
benefit himself
sure you can consider it selfish but
after all that's happened i don't think
you can really blame him now fumi and
raftalia return to the village then as
evening comes afilo returns from her
play date and is so ecstatic that she'd
made a new friend this was actually her
first friend she proceeds to tell
naofumi about her whole day but because
filo wasn't the greatest at
conversations as in she wasn't great at
explaining what she wanted to say now
fumi would generally not pay attention
to her when she spoke he'd only chime in
from time to time to make it seem like
he was listening and this case wasn't
any different at least not until melty
walked in and explained her situation
all over again now fumi thought that it
would be troublesome to be found at the
capitol gates with the daughter of
nobility but he was persuaded by filo
and raftalia to accept the job they
begin their journey the next day and
it's during this trip that raftalia
formally introduces herself to mel she
explains their reason for going to the
capitol as well as their current
circumstances talking about how she was
cursed fighting an evil monster and how
they had to go get holy water in order
to treat it when they stop and make camp
for the night now for me watches as filo
and melty play tag with each other he
comments on how it was nice for filo to
be getting along with someone her own
age but if we're being technical about
it at this point in the book philo has
only been around for two weeks so
chronologically speaking yeah their ages
don't really match up it's a bit after
that that phyllo brings out her bag of
treasures to share with melty it was a
beg she had hidden in the carriage one
that even now fumi didn't really know
about now ifumi curious as to what's in
the bag heads over to take a look only
to find within a bunch of broken swords
junky looking jewels and accessories
that now fumi had failed to craft
properly the common trait between all of
them was that they were sparkly and that
was what made them treasures to filo it
was likely something attributed to her
nature as a bird and their attraction to
shiny items to everyone else though that
would just be a bag of trash
from after this to when they get to the
capitol in the morning is pretty much
the same though before heading to the
church they first go to the weapon shop
owner to stash their cart and count
their money turns out now fumi had a
pretty decent amount of coin totaling to
around 50 gold pieces
he then sells some of the equipment that
they loaded off the bandits and then
browses some new gear for himself on
raftalia first he buys raftalia a new
silver sword this cost 10 gold pieces
but came with the blood clean coating
effect that prevented blood and guts
from sticking to the blade then he gets
her an enchanted silver armor that takes
into account the enemy's magic level and
raises the wearer's defense
proportionally as for naofumi he
couldn't decide on an armor so the owner
suggests an upgrade to his current one
one that will incorporate the dragon's
skin and core now fomey agrees and pays
five gold pieces to cover the costs
before they head to the church naofumi
asks about the strange star that's
appended to their levels you see at this
point both filo and raftalia were level
40 with a star next to their name we
know from the anime that this meant that
they were ready for a class up upgrade
what this meant though was that they've
reached the level cap of 40 and in order
to keep leveling up they needed to
choose a more specific class that
dictated the direction that they
intended to grow
it's similar to the way that elsewhere's
job system worked if you chose to class
up you'd receive a significant power
boost from doing so though in the
country of melromark only knights
wizards and adventurers were eligible
for a class up and you even had to get
direct permission from the crown meaning
unless you were hand picked by the crown
then your potential for growth would be
limited which basically meant that
naofumi would definitely not be able to
class up anytime soon
they finally head to the church where
the interaction with the nuns and pope
were pretty much the same we're just
told that the price of the holy water is
dependent on the potency that you get
with 5 silvers being for the least
potent and 100 silvers being for the
most naufumi gets the highest quality
holy water then leaves the church only
to be confronted by the young soldier
assuming it was a trap from [ __ ] aka
malty he decides to run which brings us
to when he's confronted by moto yasu but
instead of being immediately assaulted
motoyasu first tells him that he knows
he's been disguising himself as the
saint with the god bird and he orders
him to hand over filos that they can
execute it not knowing that the bird
that bodied him last time was the same
angel he was trying to save from now
fumi refusing to hand over philo chaos
then breaks out that is until the young
soldier steps in to interrupt the fight
malty tries to continue it by declaring
it as an official duel but now fumi not
having filo or raphtalia to fight for
him worries that he'd lose yet again in
the light novel that's when the young
soldier stands his ground and even
defies maltese orders he said that
because the shield hero would be unable
to fight he would take his place now a
mere soldier challenging the spearhero
was certainly nothing to laugh at it was
an incredible act of courage that left
both naofumi and motoyasso speechless a
wizard then came out to join the soldier
in the duel which made malty even more
furious since things stopped going her
way she threatened them with treason and
even said she was going to dispose of
them afterwards but they simply ignored
her threats and stated that her position
was irrelevant because they were merely
carrying out orders of their own that's
when melty enters the scene and she
pulls out her own decree that voided
mine's previous one declaring the duel
illegal and disbanding it immediately
malty's mere hesitation at this spurred
a whole bunch of thoughts in naofumi's
head
who was this young girl why was malty
backing down from her was it possible
that melty could have more power all
these questions raced through his head
because of what he just witnessed it's
only after they go to the weapon shop to
talk that he finds out that melty is
first in line to inherit the throne at
first he doesn't believe her but after
considering all of maltese issues it
made a little bit more sense
now in the anime we see naophumi just
tell her to leave but in the manga now
fumi's a lot angrier about the whole
thing because of his trust issues he
turns the whole situation into a
scenario where he's the victim he sees
it as a setup where melty was planted
into the field around some fellows to
appear to be friendly with them and gain
filo's trust then she'd use phyllo to
get close to naofumi and when they'd
least expect it she'd betray him just
like malti did this was how naufumi
interpreted it and blinded by his own
rage he refused to listen to her any
further it's this scene that leads into
episode 10 in the midst of turmoil
covering volume 3 chapters 4-9 in the
light novel and vol 4 chapters 15 to 16
in the manga melty is summoned by one of
her knights to go meet the king so she
reluctantly leaves as she leaves we get
this flashback of her and the queen
however rather than the short 10 seconds
of it that we see in the anime the light
novel actually dedicates a whole extra
chapter to it it's called before i met
my friend and it basically covers in
great detail the context behind melty's
visit to melromark
the short version is that the queen was
trying to get the king to stop
mistreating the shield hero at first she
sent soldiers but the king ignored these
soldiers demands running out of patience
the queen decides to send melty normally
she would have gone herself but she had
many negotiations with other kingdoms to
take care of however because the king
often respected melty's opinion the
queen thought that melty would be able
to take care of the job melty was well
aware of her parents deteriorating
relationship one time at night she even
saw her mother burning portraits of her
father melty knew that if nothing was to
be done then surely the relationship
would fall apart completely and that was
something that melty didn't want to see
happen you see she's actually quite the
caring person and although the king
might be a scumbag he's still her father
and a member of the family so she
quickly boards a carriage to melromark
which leads to the journey that results
in her getting lost in the forest
but back to the weapon shop now after
melty leaves the young soldier we see
didn't quite barge into the shop like
how we saw a group of them actually
stand outside waiting for naofumi now
fumi assumes that they're there just to
tell him to give filo to the princess so
he tries to get them to leave they
refuse and they tell him that they want
to fight the waves with him now fumi
thought that they were trying to gain
promotions or attempt to get close to
him so that they could trick him but
after revealing that they're from mute
and one was even a demi human he becomes
slightly less suspicious
during this conversation he brings up a
mechanic that's found in his built-in
hud that allows him to manage party
members it's called battle formations
and it's similar to ones in mmorpgs that
organize the positions of guild or clan
members so that they can fight in a more
orderly fashion now fumi thought that if
he was to bring them into his group then
this would be the best way to manage
them but we'll get into how this works
in just a second after sending the group
off to get the silver to show that they
want to fight with him they actually
come back with the money quite quickly
now fumi accepts them into the group and
gives them each an accessory one of
which even had the effect of absorbing a
certain level of damage which he created
on accident so he didn't really mind
giving it away now fumi then works them
into a battle formation now fumi would
be the leader followed by raphtalia and
philo then the young soldier would be
what's called the formation leader
this gave the soldier the authority of
giving commands but at the same time
that authority was controlled by naofumi
it's basically like having a general
that relays orders from command to the
lower parts of your army
setting these soldiers at this part of
the battle formation also gave naofumi
the ability to decide when they would
gain experience or not he could also cut
them loose at any time meaning if he saw
that they intended to betray him he
could quickly break the formation and
turn the fight on them now fumi then
heads to the church to get a class up
upgrade on the way there he asks both
philo and raftalia about what they want
to upgrade into raftelia gives her
undecisive answer from the anime but
filo says she wants to learn how to spit
poison likely because she thought it was
cool after recently fighting all these
poison type monsters it should be pretty
clear by now that filo was quite the
impressionable kid her growth is visibly
being affected by the people and events
around her she is not just some side
character that fills the lolly trope at
least not in the novels anyway if you
remember from the anime now fumi also
tells ravtalia that she needs to choose
her own path because he won't be around
after the waves are done we're given a
bit more context to this you see now
fumi didn't feel any particular
connection to this world yeah sure he's
helped some people and made new friends
but he didn't feel that it was worth
staying here he thought that if his
overall experience in this world was a
negative one then what's the point of
staying at all this prompts raftalia to
ask if she could go with him but naofumi
just disregards it as being completely
ridiculous and changes the subject they
then get to the church but are denied by
royal decree so the next logical step
was to visit the slave trader if they
wanted to get a class up he recommends
that they go to either the country of
siltbelt or shield freedom but mentions
that building trust with either would
take a significant amount of time and
the journey there would be at least a
month on foot or three weeks by filo
before they leave wanting to make a
profit the slave trader tries to sell
some gear for filo for things like this
now fumi would normally go to the weapon
shop owner but the slave trader
mentioned that only monster trainers can
sell proper monster gear so naofumi ends
up buying iron talons that are meant for
flying dragons wanting to make sure that
they're not a piece of junk he requests
to test them but all the monsters in the
area were either too weak or belong to
the slave trader so the slave trader
brings up a job apparently the nobility
of melromark had used these sewers to
raise a monster in secret unfortunately
that monster grew too much for them to
control and it got so big that no other
control spell would work on it its last
known level was at 50 but that was some
time ago so it was most definitely
higher than that now not wanting this
monster to be a constant threat to the
sewers of the capital the nobles put in
a request to get an adventurer to deal
with it though no one had been able to
take care of it as yet now fumi accepts
the job and the slave trader guides them
to the sewers where they then come
across a monster known as the cream
alligator naofumi once read a book on
how to fight alligators so he hops on
its head to keep its mouth shut from
there rattalia and filo were able to
easily take care of it he absorbs the
slain monster's body and gains a
nameless shield though because it wasn't
quite as strong as the chimera viper
shield he didn't plan on using it much
it did however give the interesting
effect of improving his ability to fight
at night by giving him some form of
night vision they then head back to the
slave trader to claim the reward for the
job before leaving naofumi offers to
sell him some bandits as slaves only to
find out that the sale of humans is
actually illegal in melromark though
he's told that if he looked hard enough
he could potentially find someone who's
willing to buy but it makes sense though
because remember melromark is a human
supremacist society so treating demi
humans would likely be the farthest that
you could go
now after this was when naufumi uses the
holy water to heal raftalia the outcome
of the treatment remains rather
ambiguous in the anime but in the novels
we're told that after many nights of
constant treatment naofumi was able to
get the curse lifted from raptalia's
body the next day he goes back to the
weapon shop where he's convinced to get
an upgrade to his carriage the old one
looked like he was about to fall apart
and philos seemed like she would be much
more excited with a heavier carriage you
see she'd often get bored if it was too
light so now fumi gives 10 gold to the
shop owner and tells him to do whatever
he can to improve their existing one
once that was complete they headed out
on their journey where we see a little
travel montage though not explicitly
told this area here was actually part of
the village where he got rid of the
bioplant monster and we can clearly see
in the foreground all the food that the
village is now able to produce it's a
subtle scene that does well to highlight
the contrast and effects that naofumi
has on areas he's been versus the ones
that the other heroes have gone to and
that point is pretty much hammered down
when he enters the famine struck village
but before he could get there he first
had to pay a toll nawfumi tries to
negotiate but to no avail raftalia tried
to argue but naofumi quickly put an end
to that too you see through naofumi's
time in this new world he's learned that
there were two ways to get what you want
the first was to threaten if you had the
power you could force people to do
pretty much anything though this soldier
didn't really seem like he'd be
persuaded by threats
the second was negotiation and this
typically worked best with antagonistic
people but this soldier didn't seem very
antagonistic either more like he had to
do the job he was told or else something
bad might happen so just to test the
waters naofumi brings up the governor
and sure enough he gets a reaction from
the soldier you see you weren't allowed
to speak ill of the governor or else
there would be consequences this allowed
naofumi to connect all the dots the
governor obviously only cared about
getting money and regardless of who you
were you had to pay the toll to get by
so wanting to avoid any future trouble
he just pays the toll and goes on his
way now before getting to the town
filled with famine struck immigrants he
stops at a bar in the city where he
spots a lot of the governor's thugs as
well as itsuki like naofumi he was also
concealing his identity by keeping the
bow in a discreet form listening in on
their conversation nafumi overhears
itsuki talking about teaching the greedy
governor a lesson this caused naofumi to
almost break out on laughter because
simply beating the guy up then lecturing
him on morality surely wouldn't work the
way that itsuki thinks it would just
look at the revolution that he started
in the northern country just because he
ousted the king doesn't mean the
country's famine would go away as
naofumi said in the anime acting like
some cool vigilante that does one-off
acts of justice isn't enough to fix
everyone's problems it's something that
highlights itsuki's mentality and view
of the world he wants to be this hero
from the shadows that triumphs over the
bad guy he's not concerned with the
aftermath only with the main objective
then when he goes to get his reward and
finds that it's been claimed by somebody
else he complains that it's been stolen
valor even though it's technically his
fault for hiding his identity the entire
time itsuki can't have it both ways
either gain the recognition and the
reward or stay hidden and gain nothing
as i'm sure you're already aware there
are significant flaws with the ways that
the other heroes view this world they
treat it too much like a video game and
not enough like the real thing now fumi
tries to teach them that but itsuki was
too stubborn to accept that fact ren on
the other hand seemed a little bit more
reasonable when naofumi was telling him
about how he caused a severe plague
after slaying the dragon ren immediately
starts walking east towards the village
as if to try to go there now and remedy
the problem this kind of shocked naofumi
because not only did ren completely
acknowledge what he was saying but he
also showed that he was feeling
significant guilt towards the villagers
ren even bowed an apology to raftalia
after finding out that she was cursed
because of his indirect actions this had
changed naofumi's view of ren he always
assumed that ren was a cruel guy who
disregards those who are weak but after
seeing that he was visibly concerned
about his actions he now saw ren to be
slightly more compassionate than he
initially thought
then the final scene after this was when
he gets his new barbarian armor titled
by the weapon shop owner as barbarian
armor plus one its exact stats were
defense up medium attack endurance
strong fire resistance strong shadow
resistance weak health restoration media
magic improvement magic defense
procession and an automatic recovery
function that last one was probably the
most important because it's a function
that allows the armor to repair itself
if it ever broke a significant
improvement to his previous armor and
that's pretty much it for episodes nine
and ten as we get into the next arc
there's gonna be more and more that the
anime skipped as i'm told that the anime
has significantly sped up its pacing so
expect a bit longer and more concise
videos with regards to complete chapters
that were fully cut but as always thank
you so much for watching and if you
enjoyed this type of anime content then
you already know what to do
so until next time ciao
